dmca.title: York Entertainment Complains About NitroVideo.com Infringement
dmca.body:
York Entertainment 
[redacted]
Sherman Oaks, CA 91203

Nov. 7, 2004

Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints 
[redacted]
Mountain View, CA 94043

RE: Copyright Infringement of York Entertainment videos 

Good day,

The copyright work at issue is the text that appears on google.com and on the nitrovideo.com website. They have pictures and streaming video on their site which they do not have permission nor ownership to show. In addition, they are charging for that video without said permission and have never contacted us to set up any financial arrangements. There are currently three (3) links that have infringed on our copyright rights.

To access these links, perform a search on Google. The following is the search criteria and related links (in all search results, the first result is the link in question).

1. Lisa Robert - Scarecrow Gone Wild
